website_summaries.verdict: A low-cost, ultra-fine tip eye liner with a creamy consistency in a convenient mechanical format.
pros: The smooth velvety matte shade has great staying power
Features intense pigmentation at an amazing price
Reviewers said it was easy to apply and lasted even through intense crying sessions
cons: Reviewers noted that the tip will break if you apply your eyeliner with a heavy hand

customer_reviews.title: Last all Day!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this eye liner for my Halloween costume and the white dots last all day. The pencil was easy to use and i even used it on my waterline because i have small eyes and that stayed on all day as well. This eye liner is a good quality and does not irritate the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: i just like the level of control
customer_reviews.text: i can smudge it the way i need it to get that smokey eyes effect Super easy to put on waterline Its my third pencil and nothing can compare to how easy and quick it allows to do makeup
customer_reviews.author: aerico

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Decent. Great color
customer_reviews.text: I love how dark of this product is! Definitely quite pigmented. My only qualm with this ( and honestly it's one that I have with most eye liners I've tried) is that it "melts" off of my face fairly quickly. I do find myself having to reapply the product and also wiping away under my eye lid several times a day. Again... This is something that I have encountered with just about all eye liner pencils... Doesn't keep me from continuing to test out different one's though! Overall, great pigment, great price, very creamy. Will most likely buy again at some point if I don't find an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: sgreyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to get on
customer_reviews.text: *Note*: I apply eyeliner to my waterlines, not my eyelids. It looks fine and doesn't cause any mucus build-up around my eye. It does need to be reapplied occasionally (as it is on the waterline) and does and takes a few passes when applying to really get the color to show. The semi-hard, semi-soft pencil isn't the most comfortable to apply to a waterline, and the slight hardness means it can be hard to really get the pencil to start applying.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Nyx please don’t discontinue bronze!
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner ever. I don’t know why or how but this shade “bronze” is literally the only eyeliner I can wear all around my eye and feel like it’s flattering. I’ve been using it for about 3 years now. I definitely recommend this liner in Bronze.
customer_reviews.author: miscreanttoast

customer_reviews.title: I tend to have a lot of pink coloring in my water line which I'm not a fan of but this pencil does a nice job of covering it up and making the whites ...
customer_reviews.text: You never know with these and being a 'mechanical' pencil, I was skeptical but the description was true.......it is a soft crayon type pencil, very slender with a twist bottom to extend or retract. Came 3 in a package and for the price, it's a bargain. Today is the first time I am using the pencil. I applied it several hours ago and it's holding strong so for now, I gave it a 'only need to apply once during the day'. I tend to have a lot of pink coloring in my water line which I'm not a fan of but this pencil does a nice job of covering it up and making the whites of my eyes pop.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha of California

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner Ever !
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to eyeliner. Its excellent. Mechanical so you never have to sharpen it. So easy to apply and goes on sooo smooth. Sometimes you have to paint a few strokes on your hand first to get it to soften and paint strong. Doesn't smudge - lasts all day. I use the black on the waterline every day - and sometimes the white as eyeliner,
customer_reviews.author: anniecoz

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Didnt like. It smudged right after applying it and got worse through the day. I usually use Maybelline skinny waterproof and I like it a lot. I was looking for something with a thicker pencil line, but this was just not good. I'll stick with my skinny pencil as no smudge and its waterproof and just make a thicker line myself.
customer_reviews.author: D's wife

customer_reviews.title: Great for mature/maturing skin!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this eyeliner! I'm 43yo & don't want a liner that I have to pull my eyelids tight to put on or really tug to smudge, & with this, I don't! It's super soft, so it glides on with ease- no pulling or tugging! Albeit it's soft, it's not TOO soft; it's just right! Totally recommend, especially for mature/maturing skin.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M-L

customer_reviews.title: Brown Creamy and Smokey!  A Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Per reviews -I was looking for a creamy fine point twist up Brown. Very satisfied, this is my second one for the price can't beat it. No tugging, long wearing, and it has to be the "color" brown for me. Not too dark, but you can add some black eyeshadow/ dark brown over it. It makes my hazel eyes pop, no irritation and stays put!
customer_reviews.author: PickaWinner

customer_reviews.title: and that is not a good look. If you are using it as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted white eyeliner to help me look awake when I’m not feeling well. This eyeliner in particular doesn’t go on very smoothly, so it does not have the desired effect. I use it on my waterline, but it is a bit clumpy and inconsistent. It also likes to collect in my eyelashes, and that is not a good look. If you are using it as a liner on your top lashes, not your waterline, you might have less issues, though I imagine it will still get annoyingly stuck in your lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: This liner rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite liners! It is inexpensive and comes in so many cool colors - my favorite is the gypsy blue. I also love the smudger brush on this liner to get that smokey effect. I do have thin eyelashes, and another one of my favorite liners that actually contains a lash growth serum to grow my lashes is. It is worth the money and will help grow your lashes and the liner itself is a precise liquid pen which works great. I hope this review helps everyone out there!
customer_reviews.author: ashleyyheatherr

customer_reviews.title: 6 hours and still dark and unsmudged, crazy impressed
customer_reviews.text: actually incredibly impressed. for under $4 this pitch black pigmented eyeliner went on smoothly, no tugging or skips on the waterline, and most impressively, stayed there for hours. tried it on at 5pm, made dinner, cleaned house, and took care of 5 fish tanks... at 1am neither my waterline or top lid had a single smudge. I'll def be stocking up on this liner so the hunt can finally end!!
customer_reviews.author: John Dillinger

customer_reviews.title: White eyeliner makes eyes look larger but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a white eyeliner pencil before but saw a YouTube video about making hooded eyes look larger by lining the lower waterline with white. I was skeptical but decided to take a shot because of this low price. I ended up loving the look! My eyes definitely appear larger, and the whites look whiter! However, the white pencil seems to blink off within an hour or so, and because it's on my waterline, I have no idea how to make it stay. I wish it would last longer because it looks great...I may try another brand next!
customer_reviews.author: AmberLove

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shade
customer_reviews.text: I love the color... which is a shade between blue and green... the best thing is the heavy pigmentation. Just one gentle stroke has a lot of color. I already had black and was happy with the quality. Now I wanted to try a different color so I chose gypsy blue. The shade did not disappoint me either. Wud definitely order purple or deep purple
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the inner corners of my eyes, just not for my waterline or for eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This definitely isn't for putting on your waterline; it doesn't show up very well, and it doesn't last. The white works for brightening the inner corners of my eyes and my cupids bow, though, which is nice. The black doesn't really stay put when I use it as regular eyeliner. It tends to smudge. Since it's not great for tightlining either, I don't really have a use for it, but I imagine someone with less oily eyelids/more eyelid space would probably be fine (I'm oily and have hooded eyes, but I do use good eye primer).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: It is soo dry and it breaks easily. It hurts my eyes to drag it on my upper lid because of the dryness and sorta has clumps in it. U gota keep the liner barely visible to drag on the lids but hurts but its the only way to avoid breaking it. No wonder why its soo cheap. Its expired makeup
customer_reviews.author: MizzWicked

customer_reviews.title: Very good (silver)
customer_reviews.text: Good, a bit too soft for me. And it would be hard to apply thin lines with it. But I decided to use it for my eye makeup the other way, and it suits perfect for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: The most perfect creamy, pigmented and easy to put on eyeliner ever. I think most eyeliners are a bit stiff and kind of tug on the eye when you apply it but not this liner! I bought it in black but will be buying it in other colors as well. Also! If you like to smudge your water line, this liner is perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kaykay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dark brown & stays ALL day
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the Sephora brand equivalent of this pencil in brown. A good dark brown is hard to find so far only NYX, Sephora, & Urban Decay (non mechanical) have a brown that’s dark enough but this one is great. Stays all day. Good I’m waterline and above lashes. My new everyday liner.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: The best purple eyeliner!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner! I’ve tried just about every purple eyeliner out there-from the cheap drug store ones, to the super expensive high end ones. I think that this one is by far the best. It lights on smoothly and easily like a gel eyeliner, however, it does not smudge off or run. It’s the perfect color-not too bright, but with a pop of purple (see my picture). And you can’t beat the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Corrine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for smokey eye
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonably priced. Love this eyeliner and makes a very nice smoky eye. I've gotten lots of compliments on my eyeliner. The color looks great and it doesnt look smudgy or cakey some some eyeliners do. Would buy this product again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give the white color a shot to use on my waterline, as I was reading that it's supposed to make your eyes appear bigger. This pencil is easy to use, easy to dispense, and goes on silky smooth. My eyes sometimes water randomly so that's the only reason I ever really need to reapply it at all during the day but otherwise it sticks in place. For such a cheap pencil, this is totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara McElwain

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: I love most everything about this eyeliner. The color is the best part. Well, that and the fact that it really does last. Downfall? It's not waterproof or smudge proof.
customer_reviews.author: Kareem and Samantha Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: No smudging and stays on all day and night
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because of reviews. I used liners in the past that smudged off onto my upper lid, which was an embarrassment. Lately I've used a pot of gel w a brush and it does great (Maybelline). So to this one: easier to use than a brush w gel on it, and no smudging and it lasts all day and night, too. None on my pillow case. Very pleased with it. Solved all my problems w others, so I recommend them. I don't know about waterproof as haven't made a study of it: if it needs touchups I just do it..
customer_reviews.author: "Tigger"

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't go on smooth like MAC liner. It was thick and clumpy when I applied pressure to the water line. Makes gunk in your lashes. Pro: let me know if you find one
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Great Color and Value
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality for the price. A very deep, dark purple and a smooth lasting line. Many purples on the market are too bright and colorful but this one is a very dark but still brightens brown eyes more than black liners will. It is quite fine tipped so I feel like I might use it up faster than thicker tips, but at the price I shouldn’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Super Skinny
customer_reviews.text: Can they make these pencils any thinner? Not to mention when I was putting on my eyeline the tip broke right off. I think because it's a gel liner, it is not as sturdy as a normal kind of eyeliner pencil. But the color is really nice, a dark brown and it did glide over the eyelid fairly well, but now the only questions is how long REALLY is the piece of gel liner or is it teeny tiny and not as long as the pencil itself would indicate? Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the color I wanted. Easy to apply and stays put. I plan on buying more colors. I absolutely love these NYX eyeliners and recommend very highly. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Okie Gal

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for contouring and highlighting my eyes. I love that it is self sharpening, and smudge proof. definitely buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Calista

customer_reviews.title: Stays on almost all day long
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best eyeliner pencil I've used. Others either smudge, run, make my eyes water or you can't sharpen it because it can't be sharpened so you use it more that twice before you have to throw it away. This just twists up and you can use it all until it's gone. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Debr1127

customer_reviews.title: The Best for Water Lines
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love love love!. Ive been looking for a good water line pencil and GIIIIIIIRRRRRLLL This is the best Water Proof pencil for the water lines.Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Samel F.

customer_reviews.title: Works like the Sephora brand
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner works great. I’ve used more expensive ones that I got at Sephora but this one works just as good and the cost is much less. I love how it’s an automatic pencil that you do not have to sharpen. My friend is a makeup artist and she was using this brand for her eyeliner, so I knew it had to be decent enough for her to use. Doesn’t smudge like most cheaper eyeliners. Good quality makeup for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Kara B

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE promise to keep making this fabulous grey pencil forever!
customer_reviews.text: It does everything beautifully in terms of ease of application and removal, doesn't smudge or fade, etc. In addition, though, finding such a FANTASTIC medium grey color makes this a true treasure. Most grey eye makeup is either too dark (charcoal) or too light and glittery (silver). This pencil's shade of grey is PERFECT, visible enough to make your eyes look much bigger without looking the least bit harsh OR glitzy. The color works beautifully for daytime and evening. MANUFACTURER PLEASE NOTE: if you ever consider discontinuing this color, I promise to buy whatever remaining inventory you've got!
customer_reviews.author: devotedreader

customer_reviews.title: Rich color, non-irritating, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Rich color, non-irritating, long lasting and the deep purple is a great alternative to brown or black
customer_reviews.author: Eerie.Brilliance

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this for fun and is trying to be edgy. I have never used eyeliner before and this for sure is a good one for starters. I mean it ain’t easy to put on like I struggled. and it ain’t easy to take off too. I didn’t have makeup wipes so it’s my fault. I put eyedrops on my eyes and pretended I cried and it didn’t even smudge so water-resistance and smudge proof 5/5 but I low key wanted it to smudge for the effect of heavy crying.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick Jaymar

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Great For The Money!
customer_reviews.text: I must say that this is one of the best purchases ever! I ordered this pencil, in black, as a last-minute add to an order. It is very black, goes on smoothly, and stays put. I have oily skin and wind up throwing away many of the eyeliner pencils that I try, but this is a keeper, and I will be ordering it again! I cannot believe that such an inexpensive eyeliner pencil turned out to be this good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this color! Really enhances blue or green eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, it works really well and the color is really deep and beautiful. It goes on easily and lasts my only complaint is that if you press even slightly hard it breaks off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Have this in black and in white. White doesn’t look good on me like I’d hoped but they do last. Dare say the black one is blacker and feels better than my $20 one from a certain high end makeup retailer. Can’t go cheap on some things but I will continue to buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Slick

customer_reviews.title: Only eyeliner I would use.
customer_reviews.text: Every eye liner I used would be gone too soon. This product stays till I take it off. You must let it dry before blinking and must take care putting it on because it stays where it is placed.
customer_reviews.author: linda hudkins

customer_reviews.title: Make the switch
customer_reviews.text: I always buy urban decay but was looking to cut expenses. I’ve had so many terrible eyeliner experiences that I hate trying new ones. This is so worth it- I may never switch back. Goes on easily, thinner line great for detail and stays on all day. I live in the south so it’s always a million degrees, and it doesn’t smudge even in the heat with sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Using this for years!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this pencil for years. I love the way it glides on, without smears or smudges, and will last most of the day. I usually order enough for the entire year at a time. Will continue to use this as long as they keep producing!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Micheletti

customer_reviews.title: Best pencil
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a smudge proof pencil. I did not end up with two lines on my eyelids. It stayed true until I washed it off. Goes on smoothly too. I bought the black and the color is dark. Don’t twist up too high because it breaks easily
customer_reviews.author: B Jo

customer_reviews.title: Eye Liner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye liner I have found. It is also nice that I can get it cheaper on Amazon. Comes off easily with some warm water and a make up wipe or face wash if you prefer. I'll say on my lower lash line it has worn off by mid day but I have very watery eyes. On my upper lash line though it stays all day. All over great make up brand.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah King

customer_reviews.title: Smooth & long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love NYX products, and this mechanical eye pencil is easy to use, pigmented, and glides on smoothly! I usually use this on my waterline, and it’s proven itself to be very long-lasting. This is a good quality eye pencil at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smooth
customer_reviews.text: The deep purple is just the shade i was looking for. It's not too showy (i use it as a winged eye look only) but is noticeable up close. Glides on smoothly and managed to stay smudge free through sweating all day!
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Bad don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Waxing crap . This is probably one of the worse products of ever used from #nyxcosmetics. Didn’t last long . Look horrible under my eye skipped like crazy and for some reason made my eye water. I then realized it wasn’t a Waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this liner on almost a daily basis. Most ask if it is liquid! It goes on smooth and will stay all day without melting down your face. It’s perfect for my daily cat eye and doesn’t flake or crumble. Just make sure to keep the cap on when not in use. Surprising that my favorite liner is something so affordable!
customer_reviews.author: KReid

customer_reviews.title: Good eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Soft enough to go on easily, but fairly smudge-proof. Good for older eyelids that have some wrinkles... Would prefer more of a point, but that can be remedied by using a tissue to shape the end.
customer_reviews.author: whiskers

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly splendid
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dark purple liner and it goes on like butter! Smooth and pigmented. This eyeliner is better than high-end products. Will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Call it NIX, not NYX. Falls apart.
customer_reviews.text: UGH to NYX eyeliner pencil. After using JORDANA pencils, I hoped for equal NYX quality. NO, NIX on NYX. Break/crumble with minimal pressure, impossible to apply on inner lids, useless. I THREW 2 NYX pencils out. Waste of $$. I will stick w/ Jordana-- even though they discontinued my GREEN favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jekel

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use the eyeliner for the wing part of this look, but I smudged it all over my lid to put as a base for the eyeliner and it worked amazing! I also have this in my waterline and smudged on my upper lid between the lashes. It wears nicely, and I definitely enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariash Dopey

customer_reviews.title: The only eyeliner I use
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! And you get enough of it for that great price. Works just as good as other higher end eyeliner. One last thing, it glides very smooth! I ordered 1 and Amazon was kind enough and gave me 3!🥰 Great experience another Satisfied costumer again
customer_reviews.author: Ashbash

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great value definitely close to my usual “sugar” brand purchase
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely liked this eyeliner usually I don’t stray from my usual brand of “sugar” khol of honour eyeliner go to for non liquid or marker eyeliner but decided to give it a go and it was worthwhile, very comparable to the sugar one but much more affordable and easier to find. 4 thumbs up the only thing I disliked would be is that it smudged easily which I am not a fan of as others are but it stayed on while I wore it most of the day and throughout a work out so cant complain there, this may be my new go to. Glad I gave it a go
customer_reviews.author: LittleKait12

customer_reviews.title: 100% reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye liner. Usually a hour or 2 after I put on liner it has wore off but not with this one. I wear this all day in the heat and even went to bed with it on and woke up with it still there just like when I first put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Stanja Geames

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner I tried... to bad I’m allergic to it.
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I’m rating this a 5 star because it deserves it, however I’m allergic to it. I had a really bad allergic reaction to the product but that’s pretty common for me with eyeliners. If you used this or any other eyeliner and suffered from runny eyes, stuffy and runny nose, you’re probably allergic to it too. But it’s a wonderful eyeliner and didn’t smudge even with all the tears. Eyeliner was a trooper.
customer_reviews.author: HannahLO

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner review
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the eyeliners I’ve used before this by far is not my favorite. Smudges easily, throughout the day. And I don’t know about you but I like my make up to say sit. The tint of the eyeliner is dark, so the color payoff is good you don’t have to buy much pressure to get the color payoff you need. I would say the longevity of the Eyeliner is about three hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie's_Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Why spend more when this is better!!
customer_reviews.text: Use this on my water line and so many other hi end blk pencils transfer onto my bottom lid and skin. Raccoon city! This stays put! I buy three at a clip!
customer_reviews.author: COMFORTAATALLCOST

customer_reviews.title: very soft easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This pencil is excellent for a Tight line in your lashes, it lasts all day doesn't smudge or melt into your eye. I've tried several pencils but this works the best and its self sharpening. I haven't put it on as an eyeliner because I rarely wear it but for the the Tight line it works great. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: After spending tons of money on premium brand eyeliners over the years I decided to try this and it's so great! It goes on smooth, I don't notice any smudging, and I love the retractable quality. I now have this on subscribe and save in more than one color. It's a great find!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my waterlines. It works. Is it going to stay for 8 hours? No, but by the end of the day, I didn’t look like a sad clown, so I’m very happy with this purchase. You may have to reapply at some point in the day to keep it nice and dark, but it doesn’t give me raccoon eyes and that’s all I was looking for. I’d order again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Diaz

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Meh. It isn't a great eyeliner as far as this kind of eyeliner goes. I tried something different due to the price but it just didn't offer the super dark, precise lines that my go-to eyeliner does. It works fine for the most part but just doesn't measure up to my usual brand. I went back to my usual. It does last a while and didn't seem to "run" or anything. Just didn't give the look that I was aiming for.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Its okay I guess
customer_reviews.text: I wanted white eyeliner but this isn't the best. It doesn't apply that good and isn't very bold. I mean you could try layering it on but that is just wasting product when other liners take me one swipe. It could maybe work for you but it didn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Stays until you take it off - very pigmented.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to eye liner. I have used so many brands (high-end and drugstore), and this is my favorite. When applied over shadow primer, it won't budge until I take it off with makeup remover. It is also very pigmented, a very dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F.

customer_reviews.title: Empty Retractable Tube
customer_reviews.text: It took me twenty minutes to get the plastic off and then... NO PENCIL INSIDE!!! Totally empty!!! I swiveled and nothing was there but a blank whole. I didnt open right away and now too late to return. At that price thought I'd try but literally paid for NOTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful this would work well, but hope faded as I tried opening it to find no tip on it. So I turned and turned and turned it until a small amount emerged. It didn’t go on smoothly at all. I’m very disappointed as the reviews looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Goes on easy but doesnt last
customer_reviews.text: It's a good price for being NYC. However this eyeliner is definitely not waterproof or sweat proof and smudges alot throughout the day. I live in texas and the heat is insane. I was a little upset that I couldn't wear this all day because it would literally melt off my face.
customer_reviews.author: Shamber Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Not sweatproof
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a liner that does not transfer to under my eyes. This is not it. I wanted to like it because it goes on smoothly and is easy to use. However I look like a raccoon by mid day whether I apply before exercising or just going out for the day.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Overall great and that black is very dark which I love... Ok update.. I have been using this eyeliner for almost 2 weeks and I have to say this is the best eyeliner I have ever owned... The application lasts all day ... If any to very little smudging by the end of the day... I will definitely purchase this again... Best eyeliner I have ever bought and for the price you can't beat it...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty happy with that eyeliner, I seem to have a high allergies now not anything to do with the eyeliner so my eyes water constantly, it does come off. But on days when I’m inside and don’t go out it stays on nicely it goes on very easy
customer_reviews.author: Big Rimz

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Smudges, doesn't last long, and looks super odd on my waterline. I use white liner to make my eyes look a little bigger, but for some reason this specific liner looks really, really weird. It doesn't look natural at all. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gabs

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than Department Stores!
customer_reviews.text: I use a LOT of black crayon eyeliner--Revlon's is the one that has longest stay/smudge proof. NYX goes on smoother however, so I buy both. Revlon I apply when I have an oily face and NYX after a shower/face wash. Great product for great price, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Alea

customer_reviews.title: NYX Eye Liner pencil does the job
customer_reviews.text: I like NYX Liner pencil for my upper eye lid. The only problem when I use it on the bottom eye it smears. If you like the black eye look then you will love this pencil. To be fair it is hard to find an eye pencil that does not smear.
customer_reviews.author: Burt Carrasquillo

customer_reviews.title: Now THIS is what I'm talking about!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few and was completely underwhelmed. This one isn't perfect, but it's really good for the price. Worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pencil. The color is a rich brown and it goes on smooth.....no drag. It almost lasts all day, but my eyelids do get oily later in the day, so that could be the reason why I need to add brown powder later in the day. I would definitely buy this again. I would like to try the blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tsk tsk Nyx
customer_reviews.text: I thought I’d be able to create intricate thin lines but the tip was a little too thick. That’s fine. My bad. But when this pencil kept breaking off I decided it’s not for me because it’s just not made well. Very disappointed in Nyx for putting out such a subpar product.
customer_reviews.author: MzCat

customer_reviews.title: This sucks
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many of these eye liners and ALL of them do not wind up!!’ I get to wear it for one day and the rest goes to waste because they made it crappy and it won’t screw the rest of the product up the tube! Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant purchasing this after reading reviews. I use this for the inside corner of my eyes, And I’m so happy I bought it. You can’t beat it for the price. yes it’s not the perfect item but considering where I use it and how long it lasts I am so pleased with it. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: not my fav. I have no brows - the pursuit continues to locate a decent brow pencil gor this novice
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I received my liner and the try the product! Its not the best liner I've purchased. It smudges very easily, and it doesn't stay put for the day... not even for 3 hours. I would recommend you purchasing a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It made me a panda
customer_reviews.text: 10minutes I’m already a panda and I went to swimming with it in the lake I didn’t touch as much water but I’m a panda all day long .no water resistance at all.i don’t know if it’s fake or something it’s worse than my wild&wet
customer_reviews.author: Rachel w

customer_reviews.title: Got allergic reaction from this liner
customer_reviews.text: I has some terrible reaction after using this eye liner. At the day I used it first I started to have red eyes and yellow discharge from both eyes. I thought I have eye infection and started to treat it . Week later I felt better and used eye liner again - had a lot of discharge again... I never had any allergies before . I wish I could test what it is in this liner .
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Detsch

customer_reviews.title: Very light brown
customer_reviews.text: This is very light - not like a normal brown. It is not smudge proof, water proof, and doesn’t glide on smoothly! I was super bummed. The price is great but it couldn’t give me the look I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing application!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing application and very pigmented color for a white eyeliner. I have tried so many white eyeliner and my waterline will be so irritated trying to get any type of pigment from the product and this layered on so silky and with minimal effort. Definitely doesn’t last all day so make sure to bring with you to any event for effortless touch ups and you will be good to go! Will definitely buy in other colors!
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve ordered this stupid color by mistake. It’s too damn dark. Why can’t they just have a simple regular brown.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Affordable but smudges
customer_reviews.text: I’ve repurchased this a couple times because it is very affordable but this pencil smudges a lot. To make this long wearing you have to set it with a powder eyeshadow on top. I would recommend this if you want something cheap but not long wearing
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Eye infection
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give products bad reviews, but I am quite certain this product caused an infection in my eye. It was the only new makeup I put on, and the following day my eye started itching. Each day my eye has gotten more swollen and painful. I am having to seek medical treatment for the issue since allergy medication wasn’t helpful, and so far the medication prescribed by the doctor hasn’t helped either. Will definitely be throwing this out and looking for something hypo-allergenic and natural.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hulsey

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great eyeliner and very easy to use as it glides on beautifully. I do find that it smudges a bit at the end of the day - this could be due to the fact that I have dry eyes and use teardrops in the morning. Apart from that I think this is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Its great pigmented white is hard to find
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I do prefer the traditional type of eyeliner over the mechanical bc I feel like I use these kinds up too quickly. Before this the only other white that worked for me is Mac and I’d say this one is nearly as good.
customer_reviews.author: Logan janel

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this eyeliner so badly
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this eyeliner so badly, but it just didn't work. I bought it bc it looked like the one my friend got me, but it wasn't the right one. It does not run like an eyeliner, but more like a crayon. The first time I used this it broke in half. Not what I expected! Now, I can't return it, but I advise you not to buy this product. It's waxy, and it takes forever to get a good line (or sometimes none at all). The only thing they I liked was the color, that's why the 2 starts.
customer_reviews.author: Jh A.

customer_reviews.title: Not great - breaks
customer_reviews.text: This has raving reviews and they really fall flat. The liner falls out regularly. It doesn't apply evenly and the liner cartridge breaks under very little pressure. And ends up smudged in a not-cute way by the afternoon. Wasted my money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lower lash line
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold a point well but I don't use this product for cat eyes so that's not a big deal for me, just something worth noting. I use a liquid liner to line my lid and put this under my eye and smudge it.
customer_reviews.author: Lokii

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I had this in a pencil that I had to sharpen and risk scratching my eye on sharp edges. Love that this is the same color but mechanical. Goes on nice and smooth and stays on without being too hard to get off. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: vacuumlady

customer_reviews.title: So this is what gel eyeliner is supposed to be like..
customer_reviews.text: I have had the worst luck with gel eyeliners all being dried out. I couldn't understand what the big allure was until I received this shipment. I figured okay I will give this one last shot....so glad I did. I received my order in excellent condition and ahead of time. The product is fresh, the colors are vibrant and apply so flawlessly. A note that the colors are a bit less vibrant once applied and dry - this is not a complaint just an observation. Once dry they will not budge. Excellent value and I will definitely order this product from the supplier again. The color range will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: JHL

customer_reviews.title: Water Line
customer_reviews.text: When giving a review, I always give a fair and honest one. I really was hoping that this eyeliner would be an awesome product but sadly, it is not. It did not last long on my water line (1 hour tops). On the first few applications, it was easy to apply but after that, it no longer glided nicely. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Wheels

customer_reviews.title: Good as any of them...
customer_reviews.text: Applies smoothly, with a rich black pigment. Performs better than should be expected at the price we are paying here. realistically, my reviews of just about every pro liner are strikingly similar to this. Nothing lasts, doesn't smudge or fade, and is immune to water, whether $3 or $30. The only difference is I may like the way one applies more than another, the fact that the pencil doesn't crumble every time I attempt to use it, or that I prefer it's a
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Good for waterline
customer_reviews.text: I use this eyeliner on my waterline and have no complaints. It applies easily with no tugging or pulling and it stays on all day without fading. The only reason I gave this four stars instead of five is that the bronze color has a LOT of shimmer in in it, and I tend to avoid shimmer at all costs. Had I known, I would not have purchased it. I also bought the black and that one has no shimmer so I think it is only an issue with the bronze. If that doesn't bother you, great! I still use it anyway because it's very good.
customer_reviews.author: Erica H

customer_reviews.title: Decent brush for makeup
customer_reviews.text: This product is decent but the tip is very hard. very hard to use to precise location of the face. This product is not very great because it would reach to other parts not going to where I wanted to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mingshi

customer_reviews.title: A great eye pencil, does all it claims!
customer_reviews.text: Those is the perfect size eye pencil to keep in your purse make-up bag, as you can see I do! I love it! It really is a smudge proof pencil! I couldn't believe it! No complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Stroh

customer_reviews.title: Barely Smudges
customer_reviews.text: Less smudging than other brands that I've used, is really hard to was off though.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Mechanical Eye Liner Pencil, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteTake your look to a whole new level of beautiful by emphasizing your eyes! The creamy texture of our mechanical pencil for eyes delivers intense pigmentation while it moisturizes. The formula is renowned for its lasting power. Illuminate your eyes with a variety of 15 mesmerizing eye shades!
feature_bullets: RETRACTABLE EYE LINER: A line and defined eye is just a twist away with this eyeliner pen. Intense pigment covers like a liquid eyeliner while its creamy formula holds for hours. No need to sharpen just twist-up and apply for a winged-out eyeliner look.

SMUDGE-PROOF & SMOOTH: This smudge-proof eyeliner glides on effortlessly & lasts all day through heat & humidity-no sad bleeding eyeliner here! Available in natural to bright shades, any eyeliner look is possible with our Retractable Eye Pencil.

EYE MAKEUP FOR THE PERFECT POP: Eyeliners are just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to eye makeup! Try our complete line of eye makeup including eyeshadow singles and palettes, false lashes, mascara, liquid eyeliner & eyebrow pencils and more.
CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS: We believe animals belong in our arms—not in a lab. All of our makeup is PETA certified cruelty-free. We don't test any of our products on animals.

DISCOVER NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP: Try all our pro makeup & beauty products, from eyeshadow palette, liquid eyeliner & eyeliner pencils, mascara & false lashes to lipstick, lip gloss, foundation, primer, blush, bronzer, highlighters, brushes & more!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
